General.Name: IRB-Brasil Resseguros S.A.
General.Description: IRB-Brasil Resseguros S.A. engages in the provision of reinsurance solutions in Brazil and internationally. It offers reinsurance solutions for life and pension, agricultural risks, cargo and marine, casualty, property, oil and gas, financial lines, surety, housing, engineering risks, miscellaneous risks, and aviation risks. The company was incorporated in 1939 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Marechal Câmara, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 20020-901
